prompts: Create a cute, playful Pokemon that loves to nap and play with yarn.
Show me a small, pink feline Pokemon that has a fluffy tail and big ears.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a soft, pastel color palette and a playful personality.

Make a Pokemon that enjoys exploring urban areas and interacting with trainers.
